column3: HOME|HOME DECOR|CANDLE HOLDERS|2-CANDLE TIN COLONIAL SCONCE
column4:
Beautiful in its simplicity, the warm glow of our sconces provide a hearty country welcome to every room in your home, from entryway to family room. A versatile decorating accessory, it is perfect either alone or as part of a wall grouping.

Measures 11.5-Inches high and 6-Inches wide and 3.5-Inches deep
For use with a regular or battery taper which is sold separately
Solid metal construction
Made in the USA

column1: 2-Light Colonial Electric Tin Sconce in Kettle Black
column3: HOME|LIGHTING|SCONCES|2-LIGHT COLONIAL ELECTRIC TIN SCONCE IN KETTLE BLACK
column4:
Beautiful in its simplicity, the warm glow of our sconces provide a hearty country welcome to every room in your home, from entryway to family room. A versatile decorating accessory, it is perfect either alone or as part of a wall grouping.

Direct wired with two E12/Candelabra sockets, 60 watts max. Kettle Black finish. Handcrafted in Pennsylvania. This light is UL-CUL listed and has a 5 year guarantee.

Measures 11.5-Inches high and 6-Inches wide and 3.5-Inches deep
Direct hardwire; 2 E12/Candelabra sockets, 2 x 60 watts maximum wattage
UL-CUL listed for dry locations
Made in the USA
